label: AB_mP6_10_bn_cm-001
title: $\alpha$-LiSn Structure
comments:
This is the low-temperature structure of LiSn.  Above 470K LiSn may transform into the  \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_tI24_141_ae_be-001}{tetragonal $\beta$-LiSn structure} (Villars, 2018).  This structure is apparently metastable at room temperature (Blase, 1990). 
 (M\"{u}ller, 1973) give this structure in the ``unique axis-$c$'' setting of space group $P2_{1}/m$ \#11.  We used FINDSYM to transform this to the standard ``unique axis-$b$'' setting. This involves an origin shift.
